title: Derby Leagues
description: After losing just about every season of Fantasy Football that I have ever played, I decided there has to be an application that allows me to compete in something that I have extensive knowledge of â€¦ like reality tv shows. This was the catalyst for me to create Derby Leagues, an online platform where you can go head-to-head against friends in a fantasy sports style competition but for hit TV shows.
technologyUsed: React, Google Firebase, Google Authentication, Google Firestore, HTML, CSS, Javascript, JSX

title: Personify
description: A full stack Personality Quiz builder and library with CRUD functionality and user authentication.
contribution: Front End Controller Logic, Handlebars, CSS (Bulma), UX, Logo
technologyUsed: HTML, CSS (Bulma), handlebars, Javascript, jQuery, Express, node.js, mySQL, sequelize, Heroku, bcrypt

title: City Scoop
description: Looking to get data on a major metropolital city? Look no further, get the scoop with City Scoop! City Scoop is an application built to retrieve data from APIs on city inputs to provide the user with quick and easy access to data.
